name: Restasis MultiDose
indications: restasis multidose ® ophthalmic emulsion indicated increase tear production patients whose tear production presumed suppressed due ocular inflammation associated keratoconjunctivitis sicca . increased tear production seen patients currently taking topical anti-inflammatory drugs using punctal plugs .
contraindications: instill one drop restasis multidose ophthalmic emulsion twice day eye approximately 12 hours apart . restasis multidose used concomitantly lubricant eye drops , allowing 15-minute interval products .
warningsAndPrecautions: restasis multidose ophthalmic emulsion packaged sterile , multi-dose bottle . bottle consists white opaque ldpe bottle , white opaque polypropylene top unidirectional valve air filter , protective olive green polypropylene cap , clear disposable shipping cover colored cap . restasis multidose contains preservatives . 5.5 ml 10-ml bottle - ndc 0023-5301-05 storage : store 15°c 25°c ( 59°f 77°f ) . opening , restasis multidose used expiration date bottle .
adverseReactions: restasis multidose contraindicated patients known suspected hypersensitivity ingredients formulation [ ( 6.2 ) ] .
indications_original:
RESTASIS MULTIDOSE
                     
                        ®
                     
                      ophthalmic emulsion is indicated to increase tear production in patients whose tear production is presumed to be suppressed due to ocular inflammation associated with keratoconjunctivitis sicca. Increased tear production was not seen in patients currently taking topical anti-inflammatory drugs or using punctal plugs.
contraindications_original: Instill one drop of RESTASIS MULTIDOSE ophthalmic emulsion twice a day in each eye approximately 12 hours apart. RESTASIS MULTIDOSE can be used concomitantly with lubricant eye drops, allowing a 15-minute interval between products.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
RESTASIS
                      
                     MULTIDOSE ophthalmic emulsion is packaged in a sterile, multi-dose  bottle. Each bottle consists of a white opaque LDPE bottle, a white opaque polypropylene top with unidirectional valve and air filter, a protective olive green polypropylene cap, and a clear disposable shipping cover over the colored cap. RESTASIS MULTIDOSE contains no preservatives. 
                  5.5 mL in 10-mL bottle - NDC 0023-5301-05
                  
                     Storage:  Store at 15°C  to 25°C (59°F to 77°F).  After opening, RESTASIS MULTIDOSE can be used until the expiration date on the bottle.
adverseReactions_original:
RESTASIS MULTIDOSE is contraindicated in patients with known or suspected hypersensitivity to any of the ingredients in the formulation [
                     see 
                     
                        Adverse Reactions (6.2)
                     
                     ].
